OverrideBothEqualsAndHashcode.description:
Description

Override bothpublic Boolean equals(Object obj), andpublic Integer hashCode(), or override neither.
Even if you are inheriting a hashCode() from a parent class, consider implementing hashCode and explicitly
delegating to your superclass.

This is especially important whenUsing Custom Types in Map Keys and Sets.

Example(s):

Use this rule by referencing it:
OverrideBothEqualsAndHashcode.option: This rule has no specific options.
